articles.description: iQoo confirms launch of iQoo Neo 9 Pro in India; iQoo slashes price of iQoo Neo 7 ahead of new launch; Neo 7 receives second price cut of Rs 3,000; 8G
articles.content: 5G smartphones with 10GB or more RAM under Rs 25,000
